agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Intergovernmental Relations TIME & DATE: 8:30 AM, Tuesday, April 30, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Eddie Lucio, Jr. The Senate Committee on Intergovernmental Relations will meet to consider the following: HB 36 Ortega | et al. SP: Rodríguez Relating to expedited proceedings in cases involving dangerously damaged or deteriorated or substandard buildings or improvements in a municipality. HB 145 González, Mary SP: Rodríguez Relating to fees for services by the offices of the sheriff and constables. HB 892 Kuempel | et al. SP: Hughes Relating to county regulation of game rooms. HB 1476 Anderson, Charles "Doc" SP: Birdwell Relating to the regulation of game rooms in certain counties. HB 1934 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the creation of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 229; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 1935 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the powers and duties of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 168; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose a tax. HB 2330 Walle | et al. SP: Lucio Relating to a study of an intake system and state case management system for state and federal disaster assistance. HB 3020 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the creation of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 238; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 3093 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the powers and duties of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 195; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose a tax. HB 3094 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the powers and duties of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 198; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose a tax. HB 3095 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the board of directors and powers and duties of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 214; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose fees and taxes. HB 3122 Zerwas SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the creation of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 235; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. HB 3422 Stephenson SP: Kolkhorst Relating to the creation of the Fort Bend County Municipal Utility District No. 231; granting a limited power of eminent domain; providing authority to issue bonds; providing authority to impose assessments, fees, and taxes. SB 1326 Campbell Relating to the release of extraterritorial jurisdiction by a municipality involving certain areas. SB 1469 Powell Relating to municipal regulation of game rooms and amusement redemption machines. SB 1470 Powell Relating to a political subdivision's adoption of zoning regulations for certain coin-operated machines. The Committee may also consider pending business. For members of the public who wish to provide oral testimony, please limit prepared remarks to two (2) minutes. If providing written testimony, please submit twenty (20) copies, with your name on each copy, to the Committee during the hearing. Copies will be distributed to Committee Members and will be part of our public record.
